description: France's new restriction on exercise in the capital comes as the death toll rises above 10,000.
title: Coronavirus: Paris bans daytime outdoor exercise
title_page: Coronavirus: Paris bans daytime outdoor exercise - BBC News
maintext: France has been under strict lockdown measures for almost a month. Anyone who goes outside is required to carry a document stating their reason for leaving home: shopping for necessities, visiting a doctor, or exercise within 1km (half a mile) of their address.
